reviewText: Fantastic look at the life of a genius chef.  Shows the hard work and diligence that goes into the life-long learning process that is cooking.  Wish I could afford to eat at his restaurant Manresa...
I put 5 since I this is a purchase for someone else that asked to get it, so don't know. I myself have never seen this.
Just as described.  Awesome.  Loved it!

So refreshing.  A huge step up from the typical "pedestrian" food shows.  David Kinch  has a knowledgeable yet humble approach where the food and his restaurant's clients are his main focus -- not self promotion.
We especially liked the relaxed banter between David and his friend Josh in the New Orleans episode.

Fascinating video of a unique chef. His love of seafood, the ocean, the coast of California - all highlighted in several episodes.  One episode includes visit with chef Eric Ripert. Have watched them all repeatedly. Quick shipment.
